name: M.ou.co Hotel - Stay, Listen & Play
address: R. de Frei Heitor Pinto 67, 4300-252 Porto, Porto
description: Outsite Porto Mouco has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and bar in Porto. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 800 metres from Campanha Train Station. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a balcony. At Outsite Porto Mouco rooms include bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Oporto Coliseum is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Sao Bento Metro Station is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 17 km from Outsite Porto Mouco.

name: Rosa Et Al Townhouse
description: Accommodation in Porto - Excellent location - show map Just an 8-minute walk from Clerigos Tower, the elegant Rosa Et Al Townhouse offers spacious suites with garden or city views in central Porto. Guests can relax in the gardens or browse the private library. All suites at Rosa Et Al Townhouse feature original wooden beams and stucco ceilings. The units are decorated with vintage and modern furniture. Free Wi-Fi is available. All rooms have a luxurious bathroom with a foot bath. Gourmet meals prepared with ingredients made from organic products of the facility are served in the living area or gardens on the ground floor. Coffee, snacks and light meals are also available throughout the day. Cars and bicycles can be rented to explore Porto. The Rosa Et Al Townhouse's concierge can help with restaurant and museum reservations. This town house is surrounded by galleries, artists studios and concept stores. Casa da Música is a 12-minute walk away and Francisco Sá Carneiro International Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Union of Freguesias do Centro is a great choice for travelers interested in atmosphere, walking and ambiance.VRBO

name: Miragaia House
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and free WiFi. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and down comforters.Expedia

name: Hotel Tipografia do Conto by Casa do Conto
address: Rua de Alvares Cabral, 28, 4050-040 Porto, Porto
description: Featuring a garden, bar and views of city, Hotel Tipografia do Conto by Casa do Conto is located in Porto, 1.2 km from Clerigos Tower. With an outdoor swimming pool, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room comes with a kettle, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with garden views. At Hotel Tipografia do Conto by Casa do Conto every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near Hotel Tipografia do Conto by Casa do Conto include Sao Bento Metro Station, Sao Bento Train Station and Palacio da Bolsa. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Casa da Marechal - Boutique Hotel by Oporto Collection - Adults Only
address: Rua do Marechal Saldanha 422, 4150-657 Porto, Porto
description: Located in Porto, 300 metres from Molhe Beach, Casa da Marechal - Boutique Hotel by Oporto Collection - Adults Only provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 500 metres from Ingleses Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At Casa da Marechal - Boutique Hotel by Oporto Collection - Adults Only every room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Casa da Marechal - Boutique Hotel by Oporto Collection - Adults Only offers 4-star accommodation with a hammam and spa centre. Carneiro Beach is 1.2 km from the hotel, while Boavista Roundabout is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 13 km from Casa da Marechal - Boutique Hotel by Oporto Collection - Adults Only.

name: Pimms Home Ribeira
address: 109 Rua do Infante Dom Henrique, 4050-561 Porto, Porto
description: Located in Porto, Pimms Home Ribeira provides free WiFi, and guests can enjoy a restaurant, a bar and a shared lounge. The bed and breakfast offers a TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free toiletries and shower. Popular points of interest near Pimms Home Ribeira include Ribeira Square, Palacio da Bolsa and Ferreira Borges Market. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Bfresh Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking
description: Located in Porto, 1.3 km from Music House, BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers a business centre, a concierge service and free WiFi. A terrace, an on-site bar and shared lounge are available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room comes with a kettle, while certain rooms include a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a toaster. At BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Boavista Roundabout is 1.3 km from the hotel, while Clerigos Tower is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Francisco Sá Carneiro, 13 km from BFRESH Hotel - Padel, Pool & Fitness - Adults Only - Private Parking, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Porto Wine Hostel
address: Campo Martires Da Patria, No 52, 4050-366 Porto, Porto
description: Located in front of Clérigos Tower, this modern hostel is decorated in the colours of the famous Port wine. There is a communal kitchen and a living room with cable TV and DVD player. The rooms and spacious dorms at Wine Hostel come with brightly-coloured walls and lots of natural daylight. Each is equipped with individual lamps, a fan and heating. Breakfast is available daily. For lunch and dinner, guests can use the fully equipped kitchen or explore the numerous restaurants and bars surrounding the Wine Hostel. Free maps and area information are available in the lobby. In addition, there are 2 internet computers and washing and drying machines for laundry. The hostel can arrange bike rentals and airport transfers to Porto Airport. The hostel is located on Cordoaria Square, from where buses 601 and 602 offer a direct connection to the airport.
